title: Bounty Hunter Shop

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Bounty Hunter Shop was a store run by the Emblem Trader, located north of the Edgeville bank. Here, players could purchase items with their accumulated points obtained from playing Bounty Hunter.

content:
Bounty Hunter Shop was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.
Bounty Hunter Shop
Released18 September 2014 (Update)
Removed13 January 2021 (Update)
MembersYes
Minimap icon
LocationEdgeville
OwnerEmblem Trader
SpecialtyBounty Hunter trader
Location

The Bounty Hunter Shop was a store run by the Emblem Trader, located north of the Edgeville bank. Here, players could purchase items with their accumulated points obtained from playing Bounty Hunter.

On members' worlds, after the shop closed the Emblem Trader claims he hurt his back lifting bounty crates and can't do it anymore, retiring his shop.

Contents

  • 1 Stock
  • 2 Prestige rewards
  • 3 Unlockable rewards
  • 4 Old stock
  • 5 Deadman Mode
  • 6 Changes

Prestige rewards[edit | edit source]

Players who have achieved a certain amount of target kills can claim a hat from the shop:

ItemPrice
sold at		Target kill count
Bounty hunter hat (tier 1)Free1
Bounty hunter hat (tier 2)Free25
Bounty hunter hat (tier 3)Free100
Bounty hunter hat (tier 4)Free250
Bounty hunter hat (tier 5)Free1000
Bounty hunter hat (tier 6)Free2500

Unlockable rewards[edit | edit source]

Currently, the only unlockable rewards are animation overrides for the Godsword special attack, changing the colour to gold. This costs 1,200,000 Bounty points per Godsword.

Once unlocked, the gold trim can be toggled at the shop whenever the player desires.

  • Armadyl godsword

  • Bandos godsword

  • Saradomin godsword

  • Zamorak godsword

The old stock was only accessible if players had Bounty Hunter points prior to 17 October 2019 or have archaic emblems to exchange.

Note: Depending on the player's rogue/target kills, the hat available for purchase differs; if a player's rogue kills are greater than their target kills, the Rogue's revenge will be available. If a player's target kills are greater than their rogue kills, the Hunter's honour will be available. Players can switch the hat's appearance by having a greater amount of kills in either rogue or target kills.

Deadman Mode[edit | edit source]

In Deadman Seasonal, the Bounty Hunter Shop sells the following potions in addition to the old stock.

In permanent Deadman mode (W345), the Bounty Hunter Shop sells all of the normal stock (excluding ranged ammunition, spell sacks, and food) as well as the following potions.

ItemPrice
sold at
Super attack(4)1000
Super strength(4)1000
Antidote++(4)3000
Prayer potion(4)3000
Extended antifire(4)5000
Ranging potion(4)6000
Magic potion(4)8000
Stamina potion(4)8000
Super restore(4)10000
Zamorak brew(4)25000
Saradomin brew(4)25000
Super combat potion(4)30000

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
13 January 2021
(update)

The Bounty Hunter Reward Shop has now closed and all existing Archaic and Antique Emblems have been removed, although you may still encounter the former on Deadman Worlds, where you will still be able to trade them as before.

14 May 2020
(update)

The standard Bounty Hunter Shop now gives appropriate items in banknote form when players purchase more than one of it.

7 November 2019
(update)

Shop name changed from "Bounty Hunter Store" to "Bounty Hunter Shop". Store functionality changed slightly with the Bounty Hunter rework.

30 October 2014
(update | poll)

A scroll that permanently unlocks the Teleport to Target spell is now available from the Bounty Hunter rewards shop.

9 October 2014
(update | poll)

Saradomin's tear and cosmetic upgrade kits for Dragon pickaxe, Steam battlestaff, Odium ward and Malediction ward have been added to the bounty hunter store.

25 September 2014
(update)
  • The Rune pouch is now available for purchase from the Bounty Hunter rewards shop for 1,200,000 bounties.
  • The Clue box is now available for purchase from the Bounty Hunter rewards shop for 100,000 bounties.
  • Climbing boots are now available for purchase from the Bounty Hunter rewards shop for 5400 bounties.
